entities.description: The various relationships of the victim to the offender.
Specifies if the victim was involved in a homosexual relationship with the offender.
Indicates if the victim was an ex-spouse of the offender.
Indicates if the victim was an employee of the offender.
Indicates if the victim was an employer of the offender.
Indicates if the victim was otherwise known to the offender.
Indicates if the victim was a stranger to the offender.
Indicates if the victim was in an ex-relationship with the offender.
Describes the number of offenders involved in the instance.
Indicates if the number of offenders is unknown.

relationships.description: Defines the relationship of the victim to the offender.
Indicates if the victim was involved in a homosexual relationship with the offender.
Indicates if the victim was an ex-spouse of the offender.
Indicates if the victim was an employee of the offender.
Indicates if the victim was an employer of the offender.
Indicates if the victim was otherwise known to the offender.
Indicates if the victim was a stranger to the offender.
Indicates if the victim was in an ex-relationship with the offender.
Specifies the number of offenders involved.
Indicates if the number of offenders is unknown.
